detail.description:
Starryville nursery and primary school was established on the 9th of October, 1996 by an experienced educationist.

Its is located in a safe, quiet and serene neighbourhood in the center of Ifako-Ijaiye in Lagos state at Joseph Campbell Avenue, Alex Kehinde Taylor Estate.

It is an exclusive, well equipped, result-oriented school that adopts a pragmatic approach to learning. We have qualified, dedicated and disciplined teachers. Our classrooooms are spacious, well ventilated with comfortable furniture and a maximum of 20students/class.

We make use of modern instructional aids as welll as modified montessori method for teaching. Our students are also involved in extra-curricular activities such as music, arts, swimming, ballet dancing, etc.

Our playground is safe, and ample toys are available for leisure and recreation

data.message: The school's management like to express how much precious our esteemed parents are to us. Your presence and relationship has given us joy and support. We wish you and yours a joyous and prosperous 2018.
2017 End of year concert/Christmas Carol in Starryville School
The 1st term assessment starts today and will finish by Friday. On coming events next week are the Christmas carol and end of year party.
For Music Instructor 09027279582

Today is World Teachers' Day 👨‍🏫👩‍🏫
So our parents relieved teachers of their duties and took charge of teaching, from assembly till the close of the day.
A BIG THANK YOU to all our PARENTS who took time out to participate in this event.

Starryville school students celebrating Nigeria's Independence day. Our students were dressed in different cultural outfits, representing the different tribes in Nigeria.
United we stand, divided we fall.
God bless Nigeria 🇳🇬🎂🇳🇬
Enrol your child/children today at our newly furnished creche with experienced and dedicated nannies
Our creche opens as from Monday 11th September.
Our creche opens on Monday 11th September 2017. It is well equipped with modern baby friendly equipments with experienced and friendly nannies. Come over and see
Our pupils in action in the on going summer funfair.
Starryvile school celebrates 20th session Anniversary on her 2017 Graduation/Prize Giving day. Glory, Honour & Adoration to God Almighty for His Faithfulness
